==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|とう|か|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=とうか}} compound {{m|ltc|桃花|tr=daw xwæ}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|桃花|tr=táohuā}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[to̞ːka̠]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とうか|hhira=たうくわ}}

# a [[peach]] [[blossom]]

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|とうか|hhira=たうくわ}}

# {{given name|female|lang=ja|sort=とうか}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|もも|か|yomi=y}}
A given name. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ももか|桃|tr1=momo|t1=peach|pos1={{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|''kun'yomi''}}|花|tr2=ka|t2=flower|pos2={{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|''on'yomi''}}}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|湯桶読み|Yutōyomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[mo̞mo̞ka̠]}}
